abstract: Federal communications regulators on Wednesday cleared the way for Verizon Communications to sell its phone lines in three New England states for $2.7 billion to FairPoint Communications.
lead_paragraph: Federal communications regulators on Wednesday cleared the way for Verizon Communications to sell its phone lines in three New England states for $2.7 billion to FairPoint Communications.

headline.main: F.C.C. Backs $2.7 Billion Verizon Sale in 3 States
